caption.title: Degree distributions of the UK (pink) and Swiss (blue) subtype B epidemics.
caption.p: MSM - men who have sex with men, HET - heterosexuals. Cluster definition was: genetic distance = 4.5% and bootstrap = 90%. Note that the proportion of individuals of each degree is shown rather than the absolute number of individuals of each degree. The number of clustered individuals was much larger in the UK than in Switzerland.
